sourcesContent:
import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; function CountriesDetails(props) { const [countries, setCountries] = useState({ names: {name: '', full: '', continent: ''}, timezone: {name: ''}, language: [{language: '', official: ''}], eletricity: {voltage: '', plugs: []}, telephone: {calling_code: '', police: '', ambulance: '', fire: ''}, vaccinations: [], currency: {name: '', code:'', symbol: '', rate: '', compare: [{name: '', rate: ''}]}, weather: {January: {tAvg: ''}, February: {tAvg: ''}, March: {tAvg: ''}, April: {tAvg: ''}, May: {tAvg: ''}, June: {tAvg: ''}, July: {tAvg: ''}, August: {tAvg: ''}, September: {tAvg: ''}, October: {tAvg: ''}, November: {tAvg: ''}, December: {tAvg: ''}}, advise: {UA: {advise: '', url: ''}, CA: {advise: '', url: ''}}, neighbors: [{name: ''}], }); useEffect(()=>{ async function fetchData() { try { const { name } = props.match.params; const reponse = await axios.get(`https://travelbriefing.org/${name}?format=json`); setCountries({...reponse.data}); } catch (err) { console.log(err); } } console.log(setCountries) fetchData() }, [props]) // console.log(countries.reponse.data.timezone.name) return (

{countries.names.name}

{countries.names.full}, {countries.names.continent}

Timezone: {countries.timezone.name}

{/*

Language: {countries.language.map((language) => (

{language}

))} Official language? {countries.language.map((official) => (

{official}

))}

*/}
{/*

Eletricity:

*/} {/*

{countries.eletricity.voltage}

{countries.eletricity.plugs}

*/}

Telephones:

Code: {countries.telephone.calling_code}

Police: {countries.telephone.police}

Ambulance: {countries.telephone.ambulance}

Fire: {countries.telephone.fire}

{/*

Vaccinations:

{countries.vaccinations}

*/}

Currency:

Name: {countries.currency.name}

Code: {countries.currency.code}

Symbol: {countries.currency.symbol}

Rate: {countries.currency.rate}

{/*

Compare: {countries.currency.compare}

*/}

Weather:

January:

Average Temperature: {countries.weather.January.tAvg.toFiced(1)} °C

February:

Average Temperature: {countries.weather.February.tAvg} °C

March:

Average Temperature: {countries.weather.March.tAvg} °C

April:

Average Temperature: {countries.weather.April.tAvg} °C

May:

Average Temperature: {countries.weather.May.tAvg} °C

June:

Average Temperature: {countries.weather.June.tAvg} °C

July:

Average Temperature: {countries.weather.July.tAvg} °C

August:

Average Temperature: {countries.weather.August.tAvg} °C

September:

Average Temperature: {countries.weather.September.tAvg} °C

October:

Average Temperature: {countries.weather.October.tAvg} °C

November:

Average Temperature: {countries.weather.November.tAvg}

December:

Average Temperature: {countries.weather.December.tAvg}

Advise:

); } export default CountriesDetails;
